subject: Football
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: New Orleans linebacker Jonathan Vilma’s defamation lawsuit against N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell in connection with the bounty case involving the Saints was dismissed by a federal judge.
snippet: New Orleans linebacker Jonathan Vilma’s defamation lawsuit against N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell in connection with the bounty case involving the Saints was dismissed by a federal judge.
